text: Jonathan 'Jon' Walshaw (born 1967), is a male retired cyclist who competed for England. ==Cycling career== He represented England and competed in the 10 mile scratch race and 1 km time trial and won a bronze medal in the 4,000 metres team pursuit event, with Chris Boardman, Rob Muzio, Guy Rowland and Gary Coltman, at the 1986 Commonwealth Games in Edinburgh, Scotland. Walshaw was a British track champion, winning the British National Omnium Championships in 1988. He was a professional from 1988-1993. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:English male cyclists Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in cycling Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for England Category:Cyclists at the 1986 Commonwealth Games Category:Living people
title: Jon Walshaw
